hero.name: I'm <1>{{ name }}</1>
hero.descricao: This is my personal blog, which I created to share about my career as a front-end developer.

about.paragraph1: I currently work as a Full Front-end Developer at <1>{{ employeer }}</1>.
about.paragraph2: Currently I have been working with the main libraries and frameworks in the Front-End market: ReactJS, NextJS, VueJS, Angular and RxJS. I create unit tests, use typescript in most projects. I've already used styling with pure css, SCSS, styled-components, vanilla extract.
about.paragraph3: I also know the Back-End universe, I started working with NodeJS, creating HTTP servers, creating tasks with cron jobs and manipulating/interacting with Databases (PostgresSQL).
about.paragraph4: I have a bachelor's degree in Information Systems from <1>{{ school1 }}</1> (Faculty of Informatics and Administration), where I won a scholarship worth 100% of the amounts paid. Furthermore, trained as a computer technician for the Internet at the institution <3>{{ school2 }}</3> since December 2018.
about.paragraph5: My passion for web development, my collaborative approach and my desire to continually learn drive me to strive for excellence in creating high-quality digital solutions.
about.paragraph6: I look forward to continuing my journey of professional growth, improving my skills and contributing to innovative projects. Let's connect and explore collaboration opportunities.
